verses.verse: <S%H7442>Rejoice<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H6662>righteous!<s%> <S%H8416>Praise<s%> is <S%H5000>fitting<s%> for the <S%H6662>upright.<s%>
Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with the <S%H3658>lyre.<s%> <S%H2167>Sing<s%> praises to him with the <S%H5035>harp<s%> of ten <S%H6218>strings.<s%>
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to him a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song.<s%> <S%H5059>Play<s%> <S%H3190>skillfully<s%> with a shout of <S%H8643>joy!<s%>
For the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H3477>right.<s%> All his <S%H4639>work<s%> is done in <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%>
He <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of the loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
By <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1697>word,<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> were <S%H6213>made;<s%> all their <S%H6635>army<s%> by the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
He <S%H3664>gathers<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> together as a <S%H5067>heap.<s%> He lays <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H8415>deeps<s%> in <S%H214>storehouses.<s%>
Let all the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Let all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> stand in awe of <S%H1481>him.<s%>
For he <S%H559>spoke,<s%> and it was <S%H6680>done.<s%> He commanded, and it stood <S%H5975>firm.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6331>brings<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H6331>nothing.<s%> He <S%H5106>makes<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> to be of no <S%H5106>effect.<s%>
The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> fast <S%H5769>forever,<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> whom he has <S%H977>chosen<s%> for his own <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5027>looks<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%> He <S%H5027>sees<s%> all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
From the <S%H4349>place<s%> of his <S%H3427>habitation<s%> he <S%H7688>looks<s%> out on all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%>
he who <S%H3335>fashions<s%> <S%H3162>all<s%> of their <S%H3820>hearts;<s%> and he <S%H995>considers<s%> all of their <S%H4639>works.<s%>

There is no <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of an <S%H2428>army.<s%> A mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> is not <S%H5337>delivered<s%> by <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength.<s%>
A <S%H5483>horse<s%> is a vain <S%H8267>thing<s%> for <S%H8668>safety,<s%> neither does he <S%H4422>deliver<s%> any by his <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H2428>power.<s%>
<S%H3068>Behold,<s%> Yahweh's <S%H5869>eye<s%> is on those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3176>him,<s%> on those who hope in his loving <S%H2617>kindness;<s%>
to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death,<s%> to keep them <S%H2421>alive<s%> in <S%H7458>famine.<s%>
Our <S%H5315>soul<s%> has <S%H2442>waited<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He is our <S%H5828>help<s%> and our <S%H4043>shield.<s%>
For our <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices<s%> in <S%H982>him,<s%> because we have trusted in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>
Let your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> be on <S%H3068>us,<s%> Yahweh, since we have hoped in <S%H3176>you.<s%>
